RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 59. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 1 Allowed4 lbs. ( Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHILLVILLE was hung four wide into the clubhouse turn, made the lead two wide before a quarter, set a pressured pace into the far turn, gave up the advantage, fought back to regain the lead in upper stretch and edged clear under left handed urging. BEAUTIFUL LASS stalked the pace into the stretch, had a mild late rally in the five path and finished second best. ROARING GINGER allowed to settle, found her best stride late in the six path. STARLITESLEW saved ground and failed to menace. SECRETS UNTOLD pressured the winner along the inside into the far turn, gained a narrow lead, set the pace into the stretch then came up empty. LADY ITCH was restless in the gate, broke slowly and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Secrets Untold
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, led, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Roaring Ginger
ENTRY.COMMENT: best stride late 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Beautiful Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, mild rally 5path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Starliteslew
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Chillville
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2 wide lead, headed far turn, fought back gamely, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Itch
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, broke slowly, trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 30800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 1 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 1 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AUJARA had good early speed between horses two wide, shifted out entering the stretch, rallied late under right handed urging in the eight patch while four wide and got up in the final strides. PENNY SHOTS never far back, loomed boldly three wide into the stretch and just missed getting up in time. BOX STEP chased the pace into the stretch, drew on even terms for the lead two wide in the six path a furlong out, matched strides to the wire and just missed in a game effort. PANAMANIAC away alertly, all the pace, drifted to the five path entering the stretch and was caught in the final stages completing a four horse photo finish. CAT'S RHYTHM trailed into the stretch, swung wide and closed a gap late in the middle of the racetrack. TOTALLY OBSESSED was in tight at the start and failed to menace. CALI DREAM hopped at the start, had good early speed three wide then weakened in the stretch. LEXY ANNA vied for the lead along the rail into the stretch then faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Cat's Rhythm
ENTRY.OWNER: Boots N Bikinis LLC and Vigil Alan
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, late gain,

ENTRY.NAME: Aujara
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses, shifted 8path top lane, closed 4w, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Totally Obsessed
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start,

ENTRY.NAME: Lexy Anna
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, faltered lane

ENTRY.NAME: Panamaniac
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drifted 5path top lane,caught final yards

ENTRY.NAME: Cali Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, good early speed, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Penny Shots
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, loomed boldly, 3 wide, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Box Step
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, drew even 2 wide 1/8pole, game effort

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 93. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 21700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 1 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 1 Allowed 4 l bs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAS CHIKILIN chased the pace two wide into the stretch, drew on even terms for the lead near the furlong marker, battled to the wire and proved best under right handed urging while fully extended. AMIGO'S AFFAIR pressed the pace three wide into the stretch, gained a narrow lead near the furlong marker, dueled to the wire and just failed in a game effort. AUGER never far back, surged late four wide and just missed. TRAGICALLY QUEWICK allowed to settle, closed a gap late five wide. RIVERBOAT GAMBLER trailed, swung wide and was steadily gaining ground late in the middle of the racetrack. THE COOKIE MAN away alertly, set the pace along the inside until mid stretch and weakened late.

ENTRY.NAME: The Cookie Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace mid stretch inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Auger
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, surged late 4 wide, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Tragically Quewick
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, closed gap late 5wide

ENTRY.NAME: Mas Chikilin
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, long drive, proved best, fully extended,

ENTRY.NAME: Riverboat Gambler
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, late gain,

ENTRY.NAME: Amigo's Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, narrow lead, late battled, gamely,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HERE COMES DOLLY never far back, closed with a burst of speed in the five path through deep stretch and got up in the final strides. SUGAR LOVES IT was bumped hard at the start, set a pressured pace two wide into the stretch, opened a daylight lead before the furlong maker then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. C MORE PRIDE stalked the pace and went evenly in the five path through the stretch. ANGEL'S DESTINY was shut off at the start and had a mild late rally. DANCE DRAMA pressed the pace along the rail into the stretch then weakened. EXTRA CRAFTY was no factor. PENNY'S TREASURE had brief speed. MORNINGBEACHWALK was outrun. DEE'S KY WILDCAT broke in tangle, bore in bumping hard with DANCE DRAMA at the start and unseated her rider. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND AFTER REVIEW TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: C More Pride
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, even finish 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Morningbeachwalk
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Dance Drama
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Extra Crafty
ENTRY.OWNER: Poe Racing Stable LLC and 8 and 3 Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Sugar Loves It
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped hard start, set pressured pace, shook clear, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Angel's Destiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: shut off start, mild rally late

ENTRY.NAME: Dee's Ky Wildcat
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in tangle, bore in, bumped, lost jockey start, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Here Comes Dolly
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed with a rush, 5path, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Penny's Treasure
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 12600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE JUNE 1, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 1 Al lowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLAME IT ON EDDIE for the lead four wide for a half, drew on even terms for the lead with YOU ARE AWESOME nearing the far turn, battled with that one until deep stretch, edged clear and just lasted under strong handling. SAY HEY KID unhurried early, closed rapidly three wide through deep stretch and just missed getting up in time. YOU ARE AWESOME had good early speed along the rail through the first turn, dropped back and shifted out three wide before a half, split horses to make the lead nearing the far turn, dropped inside, matched strides until deep stretch then was outfinished. KING ANDRES failed to menace. VALHALLA AIR BASE battled for the early lead four then two wide and was through after a half. OPEN OUT hopped at the start and was outrun. KLAATU contested the lead two wide then along the inside for a half and gave way on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: You Are Awesome
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, shifted 3w, dueled late stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: King Andres
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Blame It On Eddie
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 4 wide, dueled 2 wide, edged clear late, just lasted,

ENTRY.NAME: Open Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Klaatu
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2 wide, unprepared start, gave way far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Say Hey Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed fast, 3 wide, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Valhalla Air Base
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled 2 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 81. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 1 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since A pril 1 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BACKSPLASH close up from the start, rallied three wide through the turn, made the lead at the top of the stretch and edged clear under right handed urging. RADIANTRITHYM hopped at the start and was steadily gaining ground late six wide. MAMBO DANCER battled for the early lead three wide, set the tempo through the turn then was outfinished while four wide. GRAN MAMIBELLA trailed early and improved position two wide. MIRACLE DRUG (IRE) with the second flight inside, finished evenly three wide. QUEENOFCATNIPHILL dueled for the lead along the inside into the turn, had speed into the stretch and weakened late. MISS OVER THERE battled for the early lead between horses and gave way before the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Gran Mamibella
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, improved position 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Miracle Drug (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, even finish 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Backsplash
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, rallied 3 wide turn, 3/16pole lead, clear, right urging

ENTRY.NAME: Queenofcatniphill
ENTRY.OWNER: Kahlden Lawrence A and Wiener Brett
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled for the lead along the inside into the turn and weakened l

ENTRY.NAME: Radiantrithym
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, late gain, 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Over There
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled between horses, 2 wide, through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Mambo Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled 3w, led, outfinished 4 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 46. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWEET UNIQUE pressed the pace into the turn, inherited the lead past the five sixteenths pole under a hold, was set down in upper stretch, struck twice with a left handed whip then widened the balance of the trip to win as much the best under a strong hand ride. DOMINUS O'S ME well placed, rallied along the rail through the stretch and finished clear for second. JUPITER ECLIPSE trailed until deep stretch then passed tiring rivals in the four path. CANELA FINA stalked the pace from between horses and failed to respond. GOLD APPEAL was no factor. COUNTRY STYLE sped to the lead soon after the start, set the pace along the inside until the middle of the turn then folded.

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Appeal
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Country Style
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace mid turn, folded

ENTRY.NAME: Dominus O's Me
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, rallied inside, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Canela Fina
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, between horses, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Jupiter Eclipse
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals 4path

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Unique
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inherited lead turn, full of run, much the best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 40100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 1 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Fo r $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MR LOOOCH away alertly, set all the pace while nicely rated and drew off under confident handling. SUSIE'S KID chased the winner and held on for second in the three path. DERBY INCLUDED broke in a tangle, stalked the pace and went evenly. GONE IN A FLASH trailed for a half then closed some ground late two wide. SAMMY'S SMILE well placed, failed to respond. VICTORY DIVISION was no factor. ELLIOT THE DRAGON stalked the pace along the inside and faded in the stretch. PLATE IT UP had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Elliot the Dragon
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Loooch
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, nicely rated, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Plate It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Gone in a Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, late gain, 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Susie's Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Derby Included
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in tangle, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Victory Division
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Sammy's Smile
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,
